AI Description: multichoose is a Python library that implements the concept of multichoose, which calculates the number of ways to choose a certain number of items from a set where each item can be chosen multiple times.
Core Features: Calculates The Number Of Combinations For Choosing Items With Repetition From A Set, Handles Scenarios Where Each Item Can Be Chosen Multiple Times, Supports Efficient Computation For Large Numbers Of Items & Repetitions
